name: The detective ChuLin
description: A weird dinner, a thrilling detective journey, carefully looking for clues, every reasoning may be Detectives astray. Every choice should be cautious. Come start your adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA gtx 550 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows xp Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA gtx 550 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 600 MB available space
